# cpl start

Starts your application, restarting on file changes.

cpl **start** <br>
cpl **s** <br>
cpl **S**

| Argument        |                                             Description                                              | Value type |
|-----------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:----------:|
| ```--dev```     |                     To run the project from source and not from dist after build.                    | ```str```  |
